title: Overseer AI
description:
Keep your users and applications safe from AIs that step out of line! Overseer AI provides a lightweight, developer-first AI safety API that monitors and validates AI system outputs across all models and providers. Features real-time content analysis, custom safety policies, usage analytics, and an open-source API with language-specific SDKs.

We are committed to open-source and contributing to the AI safety community- check us out on huggingface and github!
